publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2720 Bill Kidd: Glasgow in World’s Top 10—That the Parliament congratulates Glasgow, and its people, on being listed in the top 10 world cities by the travel guide company Lonely Planet in its Best in Travel 2009 publication.

S3M-2720 Glasgow in World’s Top 10 (lodged on 15 October 2008) Bob Doris*, Jackson Carlaw*, Alasdair Allan*, Kenneth Gibson*, Rob Gibson*, Bashir Ahmad*, Aileen Campbell*, Keith Brown*, Jamie Hepburn*, Sandra White*, Alex Neil*, Bill Wilson*, Jamie McGrigor*, Stuart McMillan*, Christina McKelvie*
S3M-2720 Glasgow in World’s Top 10 (lodged on 15 October 2008) Gil Paterson*
